issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: better error messaging for incorrect metadata URL

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Stack Trace Returned When Trying to Access IAM directory Through Metadata service from Instance Launched without an Instance Profile

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When and unknown meta-data is requested from instance, it returns a long stack trace, {noformat} root@euca-172-16-152-115:~# curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/foobar 404 - Not Found

404 - Not Found: failed to find meta-data/foobar

com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Failed to send message String to service VmMetadata because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmMetadata.component}. Message payload is of type: String

Caused by: java.util.NoSuchElementException: Failed to lookup path: foobar
